newsitem.title: USA: Desktop Data says it enters NewsEDGE pact.
newsitem.headline: Desktop Data says it enters NewsEDGE pact.

text.p: Desktop Data Inc said Thursday that it and Merrill Lynch entered a multi-year agreement to deliver NewsEDGE to 25,000 Merrill Lynch employees worldwide via Merrill Lynch's technology platform: Trusted Global Advisor.

In March, Desktop Data announced a major adoption at KPMG of intranet NewsEDGE/WEB users applying customized, real-time news to their professional services practices. The enterprise adoptions of NewsEDGE by both Merrill Lynch and KPMG result from Desktop Data's goal to extend NewsEDGE services to make news valuable to everyone in the enterprise, it said.
